Installation

Dependencies

This program uses the following libraries:

  • libcurl (debian packages: libcurl3 and libcurl4-gnutls-dev or libcurl4-openssl-dev)
  • zziplib (debian packages: libzzip-0-13 and libzzip-dev)
  • QT4 (debian packages: libqtcore4 and libqt4-dev)

and it uses

  • cmake (debian package: cmake)

as a build tool. Please make sure you have them installed.

Compiling

Just run the following sequence of commands: 

mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make

optionally you can do 

make install

as root.

More information about cmake's out-of-source builds can be found at http://www.cmake.org/Wiki/CMake_FAQ#What_is_an_.22out-of-source.22_build.3F
